'''Xiao Lantern''' is an item that can be purchased from [[Granny Shan]]'s [[Toy Shop]]. They can be used from the [[Inventory]], which will release a cosmetic lantern that will slowly float away.

Prior to [[Version 5.3]], it was a craftable item and was obtainable only from the 2021 [[Lantern Rite]] [[event]]. During the event, they were required to complete [[Lantern Rite Tales]] requests and were used as entry fee tokens for [[Theater Mechanicus]] challenges.

===Etymology===
* The {{Lang|Xiao Lantern|zh=霄灯|zh_rm=Xiāodēng}}, while using the same name as the English name for {{Lang|[[Xiao]]|zh=魈|zh_rm=Xiāo}}, is actually based on {{zh|s=霄|t=霄|rm=xiāo}}, which can mean "sky."
** The two words are pronounced identically in Chinese. Based on the emphasis on [[Xiao]] for this event, this is probably intended wordplay.
** {{Lang|[[Lantern Rite#Xiao Market|Xiao Market]]|zh=霄市|zh_rm=Xiāoshì}} also uses {{zh|s=霄|t=霄|rm=xiāo}}.
